title: Singapore resident population as of June 2018 by ethnic group
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
The Population in thousands is highest at Ethnicity Chinese and lowest at Ethnicity Others.
The difference of Population in thousands between the highest and lowest Ethnicity is 2840.63.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Population in thousands for 4 number of Ethnicitys.
The maximum Population in thousands 2969.28 is found at Ethnicity Chinese and the minimum is found at Others where Ethnicity is 128.65.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
The Population in thousands is highest at Ethnicity Chinese and lowest at Ethnicity Others.
The difference of Population in thousands between the highest and lowest Ethnicity is 2840.63.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
The Population in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Ethnicity Chinese and lowest at Ethnicity Others.
The second highest Population in thousands is appeared to be the Ethnicity Malays.
The difference of Population in thousands between the highest and lowest Ethnicity is 2840.63.
Ethnicity Chinese is higher than any other Ethnicitys with value 2969.28, followed by Malays, and Indians. Down to Ethnicity Others with the lowest value 128.65.
The Ethnicity Chinese has 2.97 times more Population in thousands than average.
The Population in thousands is 3994.28 if we add up values of all Ethnicitys.
